projects.name: @wanderer-moe/site
projects.description: Frontend for wanderer.moe - built using Nextjs, Tailwind & Typescript hosted w/ next-on-pages - i18n support implemented using crowdin.

projects.name: @wanderer-moe/api
projects.description: Backend API for wanderer.moe created with CF Workers & Hono, authenticated routes using lucia-auth, files stored on R2 and data stored on Planetscale.

projects.name: hyv-fps-unlocker
projects.description: Rust program that modifies the FPS value in the settings registry entry to go past the default 60FPS limit in Honkai Impact 3rd and Honkai: Star Rail

projects.name: BeforeFX
projects.description: (pun intended) Yet to be released, heavy in development website which allows for editors to share their After Effects and Videostar presets, colourings and effects. Built using Next.JS, TailwindCSS & hosted on CF. Uses Planetscale & Lucia-Auth, prisma for ORM.

projects.name: mergify.site
projects.description: A website which allows you to easily merge multiple spotify playlists into one. Built using Next.JS, TailwindCSS & hosted on Vercel. Uses Spotify's API with authentication through next-auth to fetch playlist data and generate a new playlist.

projects.name: qbit-rpc
projects.description: A simple, lightweight, and easy to use Discord Rich Presence for qBittorrent, made with Javascript and Node.JS. Shows statistics such current and overall download and upload speeds, with average ratios.

projects.name: dromzeh.dev
projects.description: My personal website, programmed with SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and Cloudflare Pages. Includes a static blog done with MDSVeX and Tailwind Typography. Lanyard API integration for Discord RPC.

projects.name: vmt
projects.description: A Discord Voice Message Transcriber and Translator. Made with discord.py, using Google's SpeechRecognition and DeepL's Translation API.

projects.name: roblox-filter-for-discord
projects.description: Discord bot programmed in discord.py that adds 'Roblox-style' moderation to a channel using webhooks to imitate user communication, using their avatar and username.
